summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: a reusable GlowingGlassPanel wrapper was added and applied to About feature cards, NewsPostCard, and NewPostForm; global CSS was updated to support a "glowing glass panel" style. However, the diff summary indicates many additional unrelated UI/feature changes (routing/views, new sections, data/lore updates, nav/footer/hero redesign, new/expanded hooks) that were not requested and violate the stated non-goals/scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed App routing/views and added/duplicated sections (ClanPersonalityQuizSection, CharacterAffinityMatcherSection) in main and pro views.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to card panel styling and lists adding new app features/sections as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated clans data/lore and added/changed clan definitions and descriptions (including Balance Clan lore update).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goals include no new app features/content changes beyond styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Header navigation changes: admin link behavior, Donation CTA, and added Quiz/Character Match navigation items with smooth-scroll in desktop/mobile menus.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include changing routing behavior; also beyond card panel styling scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Major HeroSection redesign (new background image, particles, parallax, cinematic typography, enhanced CTAs).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; exceeds 'card panel styling' scope and mentions new animations/background effects beyond what's needed for card glow/glass styling.

hallucinated_features.description: ClansSection behavioral changes: loads from backend with fallback to static data, merges styling, and integrates WorldMapSection.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; implies new data flow/feature behavior, which is out of scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer content/links updates (brand text, quick links including quiz/match, social icons hover glow, attribution with UTM tracking, reveal animation).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also risks changing user-facing copy, which is prohibited under REQ-2 AC.

hallucinated_features.description: ClanCard and ClanBadge redesigns (new hover glow effects, animated gradients, rotating ring, pulsing dot indicator with reduced-motion handling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside specified target panels (About feature cards, NewsPostCard, NewPostForm).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified reduced-motion and scroll-reveal hooks behavior (performance/rootMargin/one-time reveal, reduced-motion auto-disable).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of card panel styling; introduces broader animation behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Large expansion of React Query hooks for many backend operations (artist leaderboard/profile, gallery filtering, collaborations, support requests, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest says no backend changes are required and scope is styling; this is substantial new/changed feature/data layer code.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration changes beyond card panel styling (extended glow shadow presets).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested; may be acceptable to support styling, but summary suggests broader visual system changes.
